entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
